page.title: 07INDUSTRY:Lepton/Fenay Bridge
page.content: Information from three large firms: {1.Name}Elliott's Bricks Ltd {Founded}1902 {Employees}130 full-time, 4 part-time {Working Week}40 hours + overtime - some shift work { Location}Near to quarry (for clay) and to railway line (now disused). {2.Name}Schofield and Sims Ltd { Founded}1901 (present site 1979) {Employees}40 full-time, 6 part-time} { Working Week}35 hours { Business}Educational Publishers; recent changes include computer soft and hardware and videos. { Reason for Location}Building size, ease of loading and unloading lorries. {3.Name}Reliance Gear Co. Ltd {Founded}1920 (present site 1982) {Employees}58 full-time, 2 part-time} {Business}Precision engineers {Location}Near parent company.
